Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

I think you need to either install it via npm:

https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/cli.html

---
...or build it from the source code yourself:

https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

I think you need to either install it via npm:

https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/cli.html

...or build it from the source code yourself:

https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy
